body: jazzboy cant always get what he wants, but if he tries sometime, he just might find, he'll get what he needs(a dick in his ass)

It's pretty much already a series, a tankoubon was released and most of it is also translated. And yeah it's always the woman on the receiving end, but few are futas. There is one yaoi chapter by this artist though, but it doesn't seem to be hugely connected to this series and you can just ignore it.
